jparsec.vo

Class VizierQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • jparsec.vo.VizierQuery
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class VizierQuery
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A class to call Vizier to retrieve information of astronomical catalogs.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    T. Alonso Albi - OAN (Spain)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • VizierQuery

        public VizierQuery(java.lang.String object,
           java.lang.String catalog,
           double radius)
        Constructor for a given cone search query.
        Parameters:
        object - The object.
        catalog - The catalog. An empty string means a search in all catalogs.
        radius - Radius of the search in arcseconds.

      • VizierQuery

        public VizierQuery(java.lang.String object,
           java.lang.String catalog,
           double radius,
           boolean coneSearch)
        Constructor for a given query.
        Parameters:
        object - The object.
        catalog - The catalog. An empty string means a search in all catalogs.
        radius - Radius of the search in arcseconds.
        coneSearch - True for a cone search (default), false for a box search type.

      • readVOTable

        public VizierElement[] readVOTable(LocationElement sourcePos)
                            throws JPARSECException
        Reads an VO Table.
        Parameters:
        sourcePos - Source position, used to check for distances in the catalog records. Can be null.
        Returns:
        A set of Vizier elements with the read catalogs and data.
        Throws:
        JPARSECException - If an error occurs.

      • readVOTable

        public static VizierElement[] readVOTable(cds.savot.model.SavotVOTable sv,
                          LocationElement sourcePos)
                                   throws JPARSECException
        Reads an VO Table.
        Parameters:
        sv - Input VO Table.
        sourcePos - Source position, used to check for distances in the catalog records. Can be null.
        Returns:
        A set of Vizier elements with the read catalogs and data.
        Throws:
        JPARSECException - If an error occurs.

      • createHTMLFromVOTable

        public java.lang.String createHTMLFromVOTable(LocationElement sourcePos,
                                     boolean allCatalogs)
                                       throws JPARSECException
        Reads an VO Table and creates an HTML file.
        Parameters:
        sourcePos - Source position, used to check for distances in the catalog records. Can be null.
        allCatalogs - True to report all catalogs, false to report only catalogs directly supported by JPARSEC when obtaining fluxes for example.
        Returns:
        HTML code.
        Throws:
        JPARSECException - If an error occurs.

      • createLATEXFromVOTable

        public java.lang.String createLATEXFromVOTable(LocationElement sourcePos,
                                      boolean allCatalogs)
                                        throws JPARSECException
        Reads an VO Table and creates a LATEX file.
        Parameters:
        sourcePos - Source position, used to check for distances in the catalog records. Can be null.
        allCatalogs - True to report all catalogs, false to report only catalogs directly supported by JPARSEC when obtaining fluxes for example.
        Returns:
        LATEX code.
        Throws:
        JPARSECException - If an error occurs.

        allCatalogs - True to report all catalogs, false to report only catalogs directly supported by JPARSEC when obtaining fluxes for example.
        Returns:

        Throws:
        JPARSECException - If an error occurs.

        allCatalogs - True to report all catalogs, false to report only catalogs directly supported by JPARSEC when obtaining fluxes for example.

        LATEX code.

        JPARSECException - If an error occurs.

      • query

        public static java.lang.String query(java.lang.String targetName,
                     java.lang.String catalogName,
                     double radius)
                              throws JPARSECException
        Performs a cone search query to Vizier.
        Parameters:
        targetName - Target name, to be resolved by Simbad.
        catalogName - Catalog name (author or name). Can be null to query all available.
        radius - Radius to search in arcseconds.
        Returns:
        Server output as a String.
        Throws:
        JPARSECException - If an error occurs.

      • query

        public static java.lang.String query(java.lang.String targetName,
                     java.lang.String catalogName,
                     double radius,
                     boolean coneSearch)
                              throws JPARSECException
        Performs a query to Vizier.
        Parameters:
        targetName - Target name, to be resolved by Simbad.
        catalogName - Catalog name (author or name). Can be null to query all available.
        radius - Radius to search in arcseconds.
        coneSearch - True for a cone search, false for a box search.
        Returns:
        Server output as a String.
        Throws:
        JPARSECException - If an error occurs.

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        For unit testing only.
        Parameters:
        args - Not used.
